title: Rationally Speaking #130 - The Atheists Own 10 Commandments
description: Do atheists need their own 10 commandments? What would such a thing look like? In this episode, Julia and Massimo discuss a recent attempt to define some secular commandments. They debate the relevance of particular commandments, like "All truth is proportional to the evidence," and the purpose of the project overall, and address some criticism of the commandments.
content:encoded: Do atheists need their own 10 commandments? What would such a thing look like? In this episode, Julia and Massimo discuss a recent attempt to define some secular commandments. They debate the relevance of particular commandments, like "All truth is proportional to the evidence," and the purpose of the project overall, and address some criticism of the commandments.
itunes:subtitle: J&M discuss a recent attempt to define a list of 10 secular commandments. They debate the relevance of particular ones, like "All truth is proportional to the evidence," and the purpose of the project overall, and address some criticisms of them.
itunes:author: NYC Skeptics
